abilities.description: Creates a spherical territory of light blue aura where the user can manipulate the fabric of space and modify people's bodies at will.
abilities.limitations: The user cannot move the sphere once conjured and must dismiss it to create a new one elsewhere. Creating large Rooms drains stamina.

abilities.description: Allows the user to telekinetically control and lift objects within their Room, including massive structures like warships and surrounding water.
abilities.limitations: Objects must be within the active Room to be manipulated.

abilities.description: Allows the user to swap the positions of objects and people within the Room.

keyMoments.title: Enhanced Tact Ability
keyMoments.description: Law demonstrates the significantly increased scale of his Room and Tact abilities by lifting an entire Marine warship along with the surrounding water.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's tremendous power growth during the two-year timeskip and establishes the combat applications of his enhanced abilities.

weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Sea Prestone)
Creating and maintaining large Rooms requires significant stamina
specialProperties: Known as the 'Ultimate Devil Fruit' due to its versatility
Can perform miraculous surgeries including the 'Perennial Youth Operation' which grants immortality at the cost of the user's life
Worth 5 billion berries on the black market
trivia: The name 'Ope' comes from the Japanese word for 'operation' (オペ)
Doflamingo once sought this fruit for its immortality surgery capability
